doc:
David Waller https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Waller 0 David Waller (27 November 1920 – 23 January 1997) was an English actor best known for his role as Inspector Jowett in the British television series Cribb. He also appeared as Stanley Baldwin in ITV's Edward Mrs Simpson (1978), and in "The Woman He Loved" (1988). Waller worked extensively in the theatre and was a mainstay at the Royal Shakespeare Company from its founding until the early 1980s. He played Bottom in the original cast of Peter Brook's celebrated 1970 Royal Shakespeare Company production of A Midsummer Night's Dream. He also appeared in films including roles in Work Is a Four-Letter Word (1968), Perfect Friday (1970), Shadowlands (1985), Lady Jane (1986) and The Secret Garden (1987). He died in 1997 and was survived by his wife. David_Waller ( 27_November_1920 – 23_January_1997 ) was an_English_actor best_known for his_role as Inspector_Jowett in the_British_television_series_Cribb . He also appeared as Stanley_Baldwin in ITV 's_Edward_(_1978_) , and in " The_Woman He Loved " (_1988_) . Waller worked extensively in the_theatre and was a_mainstay at the_Royal_Shakespeare_Company from its_founding until the_early_1980s . He played Bottom in the_original_cast of Peter_Brook 's_celebrated_1970_Royal_Shakespeare_Company_production of A_Midsummer_Night 's_Dream . He also appeared in films including roles in Work Is a_Four-Letter_Word_(_1968_) , Perfect_Friday_(_1970_) , Shadowlands ( 1985_) , Lady_Jane_(_1986_) and The_Secret_Garden_(_1987_) . He died in 1997 and was_survived by his_wife .
